item.title: On the web
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

zyle1992:

how would i go about putting my server on the web. like there’s a webclient on www.moparisthebest.com, how would i put mine on the web withou paying like 2000$ for a java site?

Lol “Java” sites are exteremly difficult to make and they are overall pointless because you still need and HTML Applet to run the class files/Jar files. To make a webclient you just need to put in the HTML Applet code to run the main Jar file of the client from your computer. It is quite simple but I am tired and I apologize, but I cannot go into detail on it right now.

Read full topic
